This is what's working for me so far.  Installed Windows 8, left in UK mode (default install locale), did windows updates, then activated Win 8 from another crack.  

Installed Office 2013 Pro from Gh0stNet torrent.  Used NK8R7-8VXCQ 3M2FM-8446R-WFD6X and activated online - No problems.  Changed locale, language, keyboard etc to US, still activated both.  

Copied data.dat & token.dat to another workstation, when launching, it detects hardware change and wants to be reactivated, cancel out and no red "Invalid product activation" at top.  

Not the best workaround but will do until proper crack released, not planning on calling to activate.

If you need to know whether the key is still able to go through via phone activation, try it out first via online activation (recommended). 

If you get a prompt that says something like it has exceeded the number of computer for this key, then  it would pass the phone authentication. If on the other hand you get a message that says something like, you could be a victim of software counterfeiting, then don't even bother going through the phone verification. 

Hope this saves you all a lot of time, try the key out via online verification and proceed on the 2nd verification (Phone), based on the message you get.

To change your product key, go to control panel/programs and features, browse for Microsoft office 2013, select it, then click on top of the list "change", not "uninstall" :) you'll be asked what to do : click enter new product key, that's it!

this key worked for me ..

Hello to EVERYONE who cannot get this to work... i can tell this is quite difficult to get work. But follow this step by step and you should get it working in no time

1. Go into control panel, chose "uninstall a program" and go ahead and find Microsoft Office 2013. Chose change not uninstall, and click on enter a produck key.

2. Use this (KDVQM-HMNFJ-P9PJX-96HDF-DJYGX), if it doesnt work go look around and find a newer one, but it should. Click continue upon entering, click continue again and let Office configure the settings.

3. Now close all Office related windows and go ahead and download Skype. Sign up and create an account.

4. Now open up microsoft word, go to FiLE -> Account -> activate account. Choose activate by phone and choose united kingdom from the drop down.

5. Next Sign into Skype and dial the United Kingdom Toll free microsoft number. Dial 800-018-8354. Listen to the automated voice, chose 1 when asked how many accounts are being installed or what now. Follow what she has to say(its all automated) then Youll be asked to enter the group of numbers, and after that listen for the confirmation id that will be given out to you. Prompt that into the boxes and you will now have a fully activated Mircrosoft Office 2013. Enjoy

Can confirm that "B9GN2-DXXQC-9DHKT-GGWCR-4X6XK " works as of posting.

For those having trouble grasping the concept of activating by phone, I'll do a quick guide.

Be offline first.

1. Install Office 2013.

2. Enter B9GN2-DXXQC-9DHKT-GGWCR-4X6XK when prompted (might need to go to Word or whatever then File>Account to enter it or "Program and Features" in Control Panel, right click MS Office PP 2013 and click "Change" to modify product key, and continue throughout).

3. Open any Office program, and you would be prompted by a dialog box. Choose phone activation.

4. Select UK and call this number: 0011448000188354; IT IS FREE, no charge. Then, press 1 for home or business. Enter the Installation ID. Then press 1 again for a single PC use. The confirmation ID will then be read out and you can enter it into the boxes.

Hope that helps.
